txt.en: You have selected Daffodilly as your favourite to win
The race has begun! Betting is now closed
Daffodilly has won the race!
You have a vested interest in Daffodilly's success as she runs the Summer Festival tasting race.
Daffodilly has lost the race
Daffodilly has lost the race
Daffodilly has lost the race
You have left the race area

'Good day to you, my good [placeholder]! Are you here to watch the Taste of Hobbiton? It is a tremendously exciting event that we hold here every summer. Food is brought from all over the Shire, and our four speedy contestants must compete to see how quickly they can sample each bit of vittles!

'Here is a bit of inside information, if you'll be wanting it: Daffodilly Hayward is a favourite this year. She has been the undefeated pie-eating champion in Overhill for three years running. And I heard she walked all the way from Overhill to Hobbiton Centre last spring!

'I'd say she is a sure thing. Would you like to place your confidence in her winning the event? I am sure there will be a great prize in it for you if you guess rightly.'

Tickets for the race can be collected at the Taste of Hobbiton event during the Summer Festival.\n\nYou will need to hand over a Festival Ticket in order to select Daffodilly as your favourite to win.
'Well done, [placeholder]! I hear you had some excellent luck with your guess at the outcome of the Taste of Hobbiton. Allow me to offer my congratulations and this respectable reward!'
The Taste of Hobbiton can be observed during the Summer Festival.\n\nYou should watch the Taste of Hobbiton and see if Daffodilly Hayward wins the race as you supposed.
Bando Brandybuck can be found at the Taste of Hobbiton.\n\nYou should speak with Bando Brandybuck to collect your prize.
'My goodness! Watch the race, [placeholder]; it is far more interesting than me. Daffodilly will do splendidly, I am sure!'
'Daffodilly is your favourite is she? Well then, hand me one of your Festival Tickets, and I'll mark your wager on her.\n\n'Good luck, [placeholder]!'
'Sorry, [placeholder]. I'm afraid you'll need a Festival Ticket in order to select a contestant.\n\n'Dodder Twofoot is handing out tickets just near here. I'd go see him right away!'
Turn in a Festival Ticket to select Daffodilly
Observe the race to see if Daffodilly is victorious
Talk to Bando Brandybuck
Do not leave the race area
The Taste of Hobbiton: Dashing Daffodilly
